Desc.entry: Provides routine mammography, information, advice and support. All women will receive an invitation for screening before their 53rd birthday. Currently routinely invites women up to the age of 70. Over the age of 70 women can ring the unit to make their own appointment every 3 years. Each GP practice is screened once in a 3 year period.

Pubs.entry: Leaflets; Audio tapes and videos in a variety of community languages
